function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on OSM data for identifying high-occupancy areas","Impact":"Inaccurate identification of high-risk areas for disease transmission","Mitigation":"Combine OSM data with other sources for cross-validation","Technologies":"Data fusion and integration tools","People":"City planners, public health officials","Owner":"City government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Occupancy model for safe navigation during a pandemic","Impact":"Misjudging occupancy levels leading to increased disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Regular updates and validation of occupancy data, use of real-time occupancy tracking","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, IoT sensors","People":"Public, city visitors","Owner":"City government, navigation app developers"}]}
